name: Adam
title: The First Man
bio: Created in God's image from the dust of the earth â€” the very first human.

name: Eve
title: Mother of All Living
bio: The first woman, created as Adam's companion and the mother of all humanity.

name: Cain
title: The Wanderer
bio: Adam's firstborn son, whose jealousy led to history's first great sin.

name: Noah
title: Builder of the Ark
bio: Found righteous before God in a corrupt world and trusted with saving all life on earth.

name: Enoch
title: He Who Walked With God
bio: The man who walked so closely with God that he never saw death â€” God simply took him.

name: Abraham
title: Father of Nations
bio: Left everything he knew to follow God into the unknown â€” and became the father of nations.

name: Sarah
title: Princess of Faith
bio: Laughed at the impossible promise â€” then held the miracle child in her arms at 90.

name: Joseph
title: The Dreamer
bio: Thrown into a pit, sold into slavery, imprisoned â€” yet God's hand never left him.

name: Moses
title: Deliverer of Israel
bio: From a basket in the Nile to parting the Red Sea â€” God chose the reluctant voice.

name: Joshua
title: Conqueror of Canaan
bio: Spy, soldier, successor to Moses â€” he shouted down the walls of Jericho.

name: Samson
title: The Mighty Judge
bio: The strongest man alive â€” but strength without wisdom leads to chains.

name: Samuel
title: The Listening Prophet
bio: Heard God calling his name as a child and spent his whole life answering.

name: David
title: King & Psalmist
bio: Shepherd boy, giant-slayer, poet-king â€” a man after God's own heart.

name: Jonathan
title: The Loyal Friend
bio: Gave up a throne for friendship â€” the Bible's greatest picture of selfless loyalty.

name: Solomon
title: The Wisest King
bio: Asked for wisdom when he could have had anything â€” and became the richest, wisest man alive.

name: Elijah
title: The Prophet of Fire
bio: Called down fire from heaven and ran from a queen â€” the bravest coward God ever loved.

name: Elisha
title: Man of Miracles
bio: Asked for double the Spirit â€” and performed twice as many miracles as his master.

name: Daniel
title: The Brave Dreamer
bio: Refused to eat the king's food, interpreted dreams, and survived lions and fire.

name: Esther
title: Queen of Courage
bio: An orphan girl who became queen and risked her life to save an entire nation.

name: Jonah
title: The Reluctant Prophet
bio: Ran from God, swallowed by a whale, and learned that mercy is bigger than any city.

name: John the Baptist
title: Voice in the Wilderness
bio: Lived in the desert eating locusts, prepared the world for the greatest arrival in history.

name: Mary
title: Mother of Jesus
bio: A young girl who said yes to the most impossible calling the world had ever seen.

name: Peter
title: The Rock
bio: Impulsive, loud, failed three times â€” then preached to 3,000 people in one sermon.

name: Mary Magdalene
title: First at the Tomb
bio: Healed from seven demons, she became the first person to see the risen Jesus.

name: Jesus
title: Son of God
bio: God in human form. Healer, teacher, Saviour â€” the only one who conquered death.

name: Stephen
title: The First Martyr
bio: Full of the Spirit, he preached the most powerful sermon ever heard â€” then forgave his killers.

name: Paul
title: Apostle to the Nations
bio: From persecutor to preacher â€” shipwrecked, beaten, imprisoned, yet unstoppable.

name: Lydia
title: Europe's First Convert
bio: A businesswoman by the river whose heart God opened â€” and Europe's Christian story began.

name: Timothy
title: Paul's Faithful Son
bio: Young, timid, but mentored by Paul â€” became a leader the whole church respected.

name: Barnabas
title: Son of Encouragement
bio: When no one trusted the converted Saul, Barnabas stood up for him and changed history.
